Class Commands

java.lang.Object
Commands
public class Commands
extends java.lang.Object
The class where all the commands are stored

  • Method Details

    • help

      public void help()
      The help command. Prints all the information that is important to know about the commands
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • info

      public void info​(java.util.Date date, java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection)
      The info command. Prints the information about the collection and names of all the objects included
      Parameters:
      date - the date of initialization of the collection
      collection - the collection which we work with
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • show

      public void show​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection)
      The show command. Shows all the information about each of the elements of the collection
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • add

      public void add​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection, java.util.LinkedList<Chapter> chpts, java.util.Scanner scn, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Double health, java.lang.String achievements)
      The add command. Adds new element to the collection using the given information about this element
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      chpts - the chapters collection where all the chapters are stored
      scn - the Scanner tuned with constructor of the Command Reader to read from System.in or from script-file
      name - the name of new element
      health - the health of new element
      achievements - the achievements of new element
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • updateById

      public void updateById​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection, java.util.LinkedList<Chapter> chpts, java.util.Scanner scn, java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Double health, java.lang.String achievements)
      The update_by_id command. Updates the element which has the same id as given
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      chpts - the chapters collection where all the chapters are stored
      scn - the Scanner tuned with constructor of the Command Reader to read from System.in or from script-file
      id - the id of updating element
      name - the name of updating element
      health - the health of updating element
      achievements - the achievements of updating element
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • removeById

      public void removeById​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection, java.lang.Long id)
      The remove_by_id command. Removes the element which has the same id as given
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      id - the id of removing element
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • clearCollection

      public void clearCollection​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection)
      The clear command. Erases everything from the collection
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • save

      public void save​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection, java.lang.String file)
      The save command. Saves all the info about the collection to the data-file
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      file - the file where the collection is stored
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • exit

      public void exit​(java.util.Scanner scn)
      The exit command. Exits the program with user's permission
      Parameters:
      scn - the Scanner tuned with constructor of the Command Reader to read from System.in or from script-file
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • removeLast

      public void removeLast​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection)
      The remove_last command. Removes the last element of the collection
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection)
      The shuffle command. Shuffles the collection in random order
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • sort

      public void sort​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection)
      The sort command. Sorts the collection in natural order
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      See Also:
      CommandReader

    • countWeapon

      public void countWeapon​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection, MeleeWeapon weapon)
      The count_by_melee_weapon command. Counts the amount of elements which use this kind of Melee Weapon
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      weapon - the Melee Weapon enum constant which is used to count
      See Also:
      CommandReader, MeleeWeapon

    • countGCategory

      public void countGCategory​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection, AstartesCategory category)
      The count_greater_than_category command. Counts the amount of elements with the category field value greater than given
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      category - the Astartes Category enum constant which is used to count
      See Also:
      CommandReader, AstartesCategory

    • descending

      public void descending​(java.util.LinkedList<SpaceMarine> collection)
      The print_descending command. Prints all the information about all the elements of the collection in descending order
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection which we work with
      See Also:
      CommandReader
